synopsis: In this thought-provoking episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, Devam and Ahir explore the complexities of work-life balance, sharing personal experiences and insights on how to navigate the challenges of modern life. They emphasize the importance of self-awareness and mindfulness in achieving fulfillment, while also addressing the societal pressures that often lead to burnout.
quotes: The point is to just share what we've learned through our journeys and talk to each other.
Work-life balance is about you; it's your life.
If you're working so much, it's like you stop feeding your soul.
What would love have me do today?
You can’t create anything when you’re constantly consuming.
You always tell yourself these things, but it was a lot of hard work.
Life happens between the work hard and play hard.
We’re learning how to be responsible and listen to ourselves.
It’s not about the number of hours you work; it’s about how you feel.
Every day, at the end of the day, you deserve to feel whole and full.
